content.description:
Speed of Causality climbs out a horizontal roof via edges to a highly featured face on good stone over a decent landing.

Sit start with your choice of sloper and bump. From there, toe in, place a heel hook by your hands, move out the overhang through a series of edges, then make a dino to a jug rail, work the good edges to the lip, reach the back jug, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work. The immediate landing is great, but there is shrubbery to the left and a rock to the right of the fall zone.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Elder.

content.description: Respect Your Elders is another long boulder problem in Unaweep. About 20 moves from start to finish, this thing has a hard crux right at the beginning followed by some confusing sequential climbing leading into a hard crux at the end that has a left version and right version depending on which hand forward you use. Either way is about the same grade- the right version may be slightly easier.
content.location:
Start on

Speed of Causality

, and climb straight through the roof to the start of

Elder

on finger locks, foot jams, toehooks, and small crimps. It is very easy to dab on the large rock.

content.description: Climb up and right out of the large overhang.
content.location: Start with your left hand on an edge and your right hand on a pinch in the crack.
